resources.string: Meatballs or meatballs are a type of meat ball commonly found in Indonesian cuisine.
Gudheg) is a special dish from Yogyakarta and Central Java Province made from young jackfruit cooked with coconut milk.
Lumpia known by Indonesians is a Hokkien pronunciation.
Fried rice is a food in the form of fried rice and stirred in cooking oil, margarine, or butter.
The activity of cooking Sundanese-style liwet rice and eating together with banana leaf mats in the Sundanese tradition is called Ngaliwet.
Tengkleng is a typical food originating from Central Java (Solo), with the main raw material in the form of goat bones/tetelan cooked in curry, but a little more watery.
Wedang uwuh is a traditional drink that is often used in traditional medicine.
Bajigur is a traditional drink typical of the Sundanese people from West Java, Indonesia. Its main ingredient is sugar palm, and coconut milk.
Bandrek is a traditional Sundanese drink that is consumed to increase body warmth
Birpletok is a Betawi specialty drink that does not contain alcohol at all, packaged in bottles and made from various spices.
Sarabba is a typical drink of the Bugis Tribe, Makassar, South Sulawesi.
Talua tea is a taboo drink from kuniang talua jo gulo, which is mixed up with a tea drink.
